text: famma aladhin saddaqu biallah aetqadana wqwla wemla wastqamu ealaa shryeth fayuafiyhim thawab aemalhm, wyzyduhm min fdlh, wa'amaa aladhin amtneu ean taeat allh, wastakbaruu ean altdhll lah fayueadhibuhum edhabana mwjeana, wala yajidun lahum wlyana ynjyhm min edhabh, wala nasrana ynsrhm min dun allh
